# hash(into:)

**Instance Method**

Hashes the essential components of the shape by feeding them into the given hash function.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated func hash(into hasher: inout Hasher)
```

## Parameters

- **hasher**: The hash function to use when combining the components of the shape.

## Comparing shapes

- **==(_:_:)**: Indicates whether two shapes are equal.

items.description: Indicates whether two shapes are equal.
